content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 10, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 44, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a wooden sword, I need to craft the crimson planks, then craft the wooden sword. To craft the crimson planks, I need to place the stripped crimson stem in the crafting grid, so I will move it from slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 10, "index": 13}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 44, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the crimson planks have been crafted, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11), to make room for crafting the wooden sword.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 10, "index": 13}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 44, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a wooden sword, I need to place two planks on top of each other and then put a stick below them. So I'll start by moving one plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 10, "index": 13}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 44, "index": 44}]
thought: I have already placed one plank in slot 1, so now I'll place another plank in slot 4, which is directly below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 10, "index": 13}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 17}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 44, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I just need to place a stick in slot 7, which is directly below the two planks I've already placed.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 10, "index": 13}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 17}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 38, "index": 25}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 32}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 44, "index": 44}]
thought: The wooden sword has been crafted in slot 0, so I'll move it to slot 12, which is a free slot in my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
